name: Hellvetica
description:
Guide Fran through the underworld, defeating demons, breaking pots, and unlocking doors as she searches for a missing dog.

CONTROLS:  W,A,S,D to move. Hold spacebar or left click to charge a dash, and release to send Fran flying in the direction of the mouse cursor. Press escape to pause the game and access volume options. R to reset current level if you get stuck.

TIPS & TRICKS:
-Hit enemies faster to deal more damage to them
-Enemies take extra damage from deflected projectiles
-Stuck on the boss fight? Try catching the ball and throwing it back to hank
-Damaging an enemy will interrupt its attack

CREDITS:
Aidan Barcia-Bacon: Background art and programming
Andrew Wei: Sprite art and programming
Manoj Sara: Level design and enemy programming
